rows.label: qev060401_MSG0001
rows.name:
*fsssh* Er, pardon me but are you one of the
BLADE-type people?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Do those in your office accept work from lowly outsider
races such as mine? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060401_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you'll help anyone who needs it.

rows.label: qev060401_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev060401_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you only take work from people you trust.

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Such boundless generosity! *fsssh*
Then I have a request, if you would hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0004
rows.name:
I see. Then I am afraid I am out of luck. *fsssh*
I have nothing to show you to prove my character.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Forgive me for taking up your valuable time. *fsssh*
Please go on with your business and pay me no mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0006
rows.name:
*fsssh* One of my people named Arsenican departed
for Noctilum a short while ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0007
rows.name:
While it is true that the area is a source of high-grade
voltant, Mira is a very different world than our home
planet of Bedun. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0008
rows.name: I fear he will be killed by the creatures of those woods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0009
rows.name:
*fsssh* Therefore, I am in need of someone to bring
him back to the city as soon and safely as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_JNK0030
rows.name: Ask about Noctilum

rows.label: qev060401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask why Arsenican went to Noctilum.

rows.label: qev060401_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask about Voltant

rows.label: qev060401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Trachlo what "voltant" is.

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0010
rows.name:
An excellent question that evinces calm, rational
professionalism. *fsssh* You BLADEs certainly do
live up to your reputations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0011
rows.name:
*fsssh* We Zaruboggan exist solely to devoltanize those
areas of the world which have gone voltant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Whenever we hear of a place where voltant is
spreading, we cannot help but to go there. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0013
rows.name:
I sincerely appreciate you pointing out where I have
failed to adequately explain. *fsssh* It is most helpful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0014
rows.name:
*fsssh* I still do not have a firm grasp on how much
you humans know about us Zaruboggan, and what we
must explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Put simply, voltant is the source of our nutrition. *fsssh*
...But that is TOO simple an explanation, I fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0016
rows.name:
To devoltanize voltant is our duty, our calling,
and the sole reason for our existence. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0017
rows.name: I am afraid I do not explain it well. *fsssh* Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0018
rows.name:
If, for example, you were presented with a plate of
food after days of fasting, might you not instinctively
rush toward it? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0019
rows.name:
That state is the exception for your kind. *fsssh*
For us, however, it is ever-constant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0020
rows.name:
*fsssh* Keeping those urges in check among our people
was my responsibility as director of planning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0021
rows.name:
But Arsenican left to obey the voice of Golbogga,
which is etched within his flesh. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0022
rows.name:
He is faithful to his calling and a cherished member of
my tribe. *fsssh* Will you help me keep him safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0023
rows.name:
I am in your debt. *fsssh* I believe he is headed for
the Vitriol Cesspool in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0024
rows.name:
I beg of you, protect the life of my friend and fellow
child of Golbogga. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0025
rows.name:
*fsssh* If one of my kind were attacked by the indigens
of the Noctilum forest, we would certainly die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0026
rows.name:
So please protect the life of my friend and fellow child
of Golbogga. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Thank you so very much, brave BLADE. *fsssh*
Arsenican told me about all that happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0028
rows.name:
*fsssh* As director of planning for Bedun's North-3C
Block, allow me to present you with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0029
rows.name:
It is a humble sign of my gratitude for your preserving
the life of a child of Golbogga. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0030
rows.name:
I...I do not suppose it is prudent for me to say this as
director of planning, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0031
rows.name: *fsssh* I understand why Arsenican felt as he did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0032
rows.name:
Our homeworld, Bedun, was a paradise covered
entirely in dense voltant. *fsssh* I fear Mira may
simply be too clean for my kind of survive here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0033
rows.name:
We are all working to suppress our appetites,
but as with any hunger, the longer they are ignored,
the stronger they become. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_JNK0050
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev060401_SEL0051
rows.name: Express pity for the Zaruboggan's plight.

rows.label: qev060401_JNK0060
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060401_SEL0061
rows.name:
Ask whether the voltant in NLA would
be enough to sate their appetites.

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0034
rows.name: *fsssh* You are as merciful as Golbogga himself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0035
rows.name:
Were we never brought to this world,
I would not have met you. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0036
rows.name:
That thought gives me the strength to keep my eyes
forward and my feet moving, despite the gnawing
hunger. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0037
rows.name:
*fsssh* Fortunately, you humans seem to be veritable
geniuses at producing voltant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060401_MSG0038
rows.name:
If you will have us, I will attempt to sustain my people
on the bounty of your city. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
